database-source/alert-host: You must specify a database host
database-source/alert-port: You must specify a database port
database-source/alert-user: You must specify a database user
database-source/alert-password: You must specify a database password
database-source/alert-connection-name: You must specify a connection name
database-source/alert-initial-database: You must specify an initial database
database-source/alert-query: You must specify a valid query
database-source/alert-invalid-query-sele: Query must start with SELECT Keyword
database-source/databaseHostPlaceholder: Enter the database server domain or IP
database-source/databaseNamePlaceholder: Enter the name of the database
database-source/databaseFileNamePlacehol: Enter the full path to the database file
database-source/databaseSchemaPlaceholde: Enter the initial schema of the database
database-source/alert-conn-name-invalid-: Connection Name Input Error: Illegal Character in Input. Only [a-zA-Z0-9._-] Allowed
database-source/alert-db-host-invalid-ch: Database Host Error: Illegal Character in Input. Only Alphanumeric characters allowed
database-source/alert-db-user-invalid-ch: Database User Error: Illegal Character in Input. Only Alphanumeric characters allowed
database-source/alert-db-port-invalid-ch: Database Port Error: Illegal Character in Input. Only Numeric values allowed.
